title: XC please help
body: so i bought star gaudian jinx and i clicked to view skin and nothing loaded on my screen and suddenly a messaged popped up saying i purchased challenger nidalee and i didnt want it and a confirmation notice never popped up asking if  i wanted it, please help me rito. i bought 20$ worth of rp and only wanted star gaurdian jinx not challenger nidalee

replies.body:
I'm not promising anything, but if you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and clearly explain what happened as you did here, we *may* be able to help. Please don't use the Challenger Nidalee skin until you've heard back from a billing specialist about the decision.

Let me know if you have any question.
hey i have a question. i noticed a couple weeks ago that snow day bard is available for purchase and i was wondering why that is as it is not even close to snow down.
Probably because Bard isn't that old of a champ and he only has one other skin available for purchase. ^.^
Thank you, i will certainly do that right away
Hello, tokens were designed for that kind of misclick, if you used your three tokens already, nothing you can do, sorry.
i understand that is the point of refund tokens but to have not even gotten a confirmation to buy a skin like come on that is just plain ridiculous.
